frontend package

Submodules

frontend.admin module

frontend.admin.add_b_frame(root, user)[source]

Creates a frame for adding a book in the user interface.

Parameters: - root: The root Tkinter window. - user: The user name.

Returns: None

frontend.admin.add_e_frame(root, user)[source]

This function adds an e_frame to the root window and sets up the necessary GUI components for user input.

Parameters: - root: The root window to which the e_frame will be added. - user: The user object associated with the current session.

Returns: None

frontend.admin.admin_frame(root, user)[source]

Creates the admin frame for the user interface.

Parameters: - root: The root Tkinter window. - user: The user object representing the admin.

Return: None

frontend.admin.remove_b_frame(root, user)[source]

Removes the ‘b_frame’ from the root window and displays the admin frame.

Parameters: - root: The root window. - user: The user object.

Returns: None

frontend.admin.remove_e_frame(root, user)[source]

Removes the “e_frame” from the root window and displays the “remove_e_pg_frame” which contains a confirm input form for removing an employee.

Parameters:

root (tk.Tk): The root window object. user (str): The username of the user.

Returns:

None

frontend.customer module

frontend.customer.customer_frame(root, user)[source]

Generates a customer frame in the given root window for the specified user.

Parameters: - root: The root window in which the customer frame will be generated. - user: An instance of the User class representing the customer.

Returns: None

frontend.employee module

frontend.employee.employee_frame(root, user)[source]

Creates and displays the employee frame GUI.

Args:

root: The root Tkinter window. user: The user object representing the employee.

Returns:

None

frontend.employee.issue_frame(root, user)[source]

Generates the function comment for the given function body in a markdown code block with the correct language syntax.

Args:

root: The root tkinter window. user: The user object.

Returns:

None

frontend.employee.return_issue_frame(root, user)[source]

Generates a function comment for the given function body.

Args:

root: The root Tkinter object. user: The user object.

Returns:

None
